title: Yolllo
author: Yolllo
created_time: September 22, 2022, 05:25:45 PMLast edit: October 05, 2022, 07:58:51 PM by Yolllo
content: YOlllO is the social network of a new generation with its own blockchain and NFT technology that attracts users with interesting content and allows to monetize the time you spend inside.We give people from any place of the world an opportunity to get the demanded digital professions, improve leadership and sales skills, and earn in different ways: creating content and converting it into valuable NFT tokens, evaluating content, building up teams of producers and teams of content creators, and staking.Besides, we have created comfortable tools, technologies and innovations for work and development: personal back office, CRM, psychological health application Happiness App, educative platform Vividly Academy, banking application Yo Pay, protected crypto wallet Ava Pay, own marketplace for sales of NFT Tokens, system of partnership remunerations, social club for networking and communication with like-minded people.Yolllo ecosystem is aimed to help people to find satisfaction, happiness, and create financial safety working on the internet.The launch of the social network Yolllo will be held on September, 23-26th of 2022 in Dubai!Our website is available in 18 languages https://yolllobusiness.comWhitePaper: https://office.yolllobusiness.com/upload/files/a6/5b/Yolllo_White_Paper.pdfTelegram: https://t.me/yolllo_official_channelOfficial Yolllo chat in Telegram: https://t.me/yolllo_official_chatInstagram: https://www.instagram.com/yolllo_official/Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/yolllo.official/LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/yolllo-official/YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/YollloOfficialChannelTwitter: https://twitter.com/YollloOfficialYolllo Official Bounty Program50 000 Yolllo Tokens reserved for the Bounty campaign.All participants of the Yolllo Official Bounty Program have to join Bounty group:https://t.me/yolllo_official_chat General conditions:Complete 30 simple tasks and prepare your wallet! Join our Telegram group +25 pointsSubscribe to us on YouTube +25 pointsVisit us on Instagram +25 pointsVisit us on Facebook +25 pointsAdd us on LinkedIn+25 pointsSubscribe to us on YouTube +25 pointsVisit us on Instagram +25 pointsVisit us on Facebook +25 pointsJoin our Telegram channel +25 pointsAdd us on LinkedIn+25 pointsSubscribe to us on YouTube +25 pointsVisit us on Instagram +25 pointsVisit us on Facebook +25 pointsJoin our Telegram channel +25 pointsAdd us on LinkedIn+25 pointsSubscribe to us on YouTube +25 pointsVisit us on Instagram +25 pointsVisit us on Facebook +25 pointsJoin our Telegram channel  +25 pointsSubscribe to us on YouTube +25 pointsVisit us on Instagram +25 pointsVisit us on Facebook +25 pointsJoin our Telegram channel +25 pointsAdd us on LinkedIn+25 pointsDownload our app "AvaPay wallet" +30 pointsDownload our app "YoPay" +30 pointsInvite 3 like-minded people to our Telegram chat +100 pointsGo to our Telegram group and write a review about our project +50 pointsMake a video and post it on your YouTube channel +50 pointsTell us on your Instagram or Facebook what attracted you to the Yolllo ecosystem! +50 pointsTo register in the Yolllo Official Bounty program, follow the link, register and complete the tasks: https://contest.yolllobusiness.comIMPORTANT: to get Yolllo Token for tasks accomplishment, you need to register via the link: https://contest.yolllobusiness.com
